title: Notes & Capture System
description:
Unified note-taking and capture system integrating Hammerspoon, Neovim (obsidian.nvim), and a floating Kitty terminal window for seamless capture workflows across the system.

Goals:
- Quick capture of text/ideas from anywhere on the system
- Context-aware capture (grab selected text + source metadata without clipboard pollution)
- Floating notes window that persists and toggles cleanly
- Integration with daily notes via obsidian.nvim

Architecture:
- Floating notes terminal: Kitty with persistent nvim session
- Main terminal: Ghostty (tmux) - unchanged
- Window management: Hammerspoon toggle with previousApp restore
- Context capture: Swift script via Accessibility API (no clipboard)
- Note storage: Obsidian vault with obsidian.nvim
